name: ai-stock-predictions
description: CLI application for stock price prediction using TensorFlow.js LSTM models

scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:coverage && npm run knip
scripts.example: node src/index.ts init --workspace-dir=data_example --force && node src/index.ts symbol-add AAPL,NVDA --workspace-dir=data_example && node src/index.ts sync --workspace-dir=data_example && node src/index.ts train --workspace-dir=data_example --quick-test && node src/index.ts predict --workspace-dir=data_example --quick-test
scripts.example:full: node src/index.ts init --force && node src/index.ts symbol-add  AAPL,NVDA,EBS.VI,ORCL,QS,WFC,RKLB,GOOG,AMZN,MSFT,ABNB,AMRC,OTLY,DOCS.L,PYPL,432.F && node src/index.ts sync && node src/index.ts train && node src/index.ts predict
scripts.docker:copy-output: docker run --rm -v ai-stock-data:/app/data -v $(pwd)/docker-output:/host alpine sh -c 'mkdir -p /host && cp -r /app/data/output/* /host/ 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.docker:copy-export: docker run --rm -v ai-stock-data:/app/data -v $(pwd)/docker-export:/host alpine sh -c 'mkdir -p /host && cp -r /app/data/export/* /host/ 2>/dev/null || true'
scripts.docker:clean-volumes: docker volume rm ai-stock-config ai-stock-data ai-stock-output ai-stock-export 2>/dev/null || true

author: AI Stock Predictions CLI
